text:
Slack Bot Tester/QA | San Francisco CA | Remote OK | INTERNS OK

Slack Bot testers are needed for extending testing overall functionality of new slack bots and other messenger bots. Must be familiar with slack and at least the functionality of our current slack bot: http://sumve.com/slack/cc

Required: - Previous testing, curating or Quality Assurance work Optional: - Python and some scripting experience

Contact: biomimic@gmail.com
